column14: Feu Monsieur Pierre-Louis de Molo, En son vivant Chanoine de l'Eglise cathedrale de St. Bavon à Gand, et par feue Dame Cathérine Blaere, Douairiere de Monsieur Pierre de Lespée
column72: Salle ordinaire de Vente dans la Mairie
column80: Sale of books, mss., few pictures, prints and misc. furniture, music.  Title page has only the year, but the vacations are inserted on a separate page.  The day was originally Oct.20/24, changed by hand to Oct.22/26.
